author: Z.B. Steele
description:
I’ve been a nerd since I was born, and I’ve always been called to stories. They come in all shapes and facets: movies, shows, books, songs, video-games, and more. It’s a long, long list, but if I spent my life consuming these stories, it’d be a good one. Books and video-games are always the two […]

The post 12 book recommendations for the video game lover appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: 12 book recommendations for the video game lover
